critique: The document describes the establishment of a Good Conduct Medal for enlisted men in the Army. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is joy for those who receive the medal and perhaps a sense of pride and motivation for others to achieve it. There might be a slight surprise element for those unaware of the new medal. There's no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust in the context of this document. The initial scores are based on this assessment.
